segment.source: This section provides information about how to deploy the Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 components and how to uninstall the components.
segment.target: This section provides information about how to deploy the Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 components and how to uninstall the components.

segment.source: How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager
segment.target: How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager

segment.source: Describes how to install the MED-V Workspace Packager, which you use to create MED-V workspaces.
segment.target: Describes how to install the MED-V Workspace Packager, which you use to create MED-V workspaces.

segment.source: How to Deploy the MED-V Components Through an Electronic Software Distribution System
segment.target: How to Deploy the MED-V Components Through an Electronic Software Distribution System

segment.source: Describes how to manually install the MED-V components by using an electronic software distribution (ESD) system.
segment.target: Describes how to manually install the MED-V components by using an electronic software distribution (ESD) system.

segment.source: How to Manually Install the MED-V Host Agent
segment.target: How to Manually Install the MED-V Host Agent

segment.source: Describes how to install the MED-V Host Agent.
segment.target: Describes how to install the MED-V Host Agent.

segment.source: How to Uninstall the MED-V Components
segment.target: How to Uninstall the MED-V Components

segment.source: Describes how to uninstall the MED-V components.
segment.target: Describes how to uninstall the MED-V components.

segment.source: Prepare the Deployment Environment for MED-V
segment.target: Prepare the Deployment Environment for MED-V
